generations.name: 350Z Facelift Bi-Xenon
generations.notes: Desirable upgrade. Requires rewiring for 03-05 cars.

interchange_notes: 06+ lights physically fit 03-05 but require connector modification.

generations.name: 350Z Facelift LED
generations.notes: Full LED. Direct plug-and-play for older models.

generations.name: 7-Inch LED Projector (Universal)
generations.notes: Massive upgrade. Fits CJ, YJ, TJ, JK (with adapter), Miata NA, Classic Trucks, Classic Mustang, Classic Camaro.

interchange_notes: The 7-inch round headlight is the most universal part in history. Fits Jeep CJ/TJ/JK, Miata NA, Classic Mini, Defender, F100, C10, Mustang Gen 1, Camaro Gen 1/2.

generations.name: W/T Sealed Beam (Work Truck)
generations.notes: Single rectangular sealed beam. Basic grille.

generations.name: Silverado Composite
generations.notes: Separate high/low bulbs. Requires different grille and pigtails if swapping from W/T.

interchange_notes: Swapping from Sealed Beam to Composite requires the Silverado grille, headlight buckets, and wiring pigtails.

generations.name: E46 Sedan Facelift
generations.notes: Turn signal screws in. Fenders are different.

generations.name: E46 Coupe Facelift
generations.notes: One-piece unit style. Not interchangeable with pre-LCI fenders.

interchange_notes: Strictly generation specific. Fenders must match headlights.

generations.name: Impreza Blobeye
generations.notes: Teardrop style. Requires new bumper/fenders/hood to swap to Bugeye.

generations.name: Impreza Hawkeye
generations.notes: Sharp style. Requires front end conversion to swap.

interchange_notes: Requires full front-end conversion (Fenders, Hood, Bumper, Grill) to swap between generations.
